text: Festive Arts Theatre in Tampines is a cozy local cinema! With one show per period, it's perfect for a chill movie night. Box office opens 30 mins before each show, and tickets are sold on the day. Decent sound, comfy seats with cup holders, clean venue, and discounts for seniors and students - what more could you ask for?

Nice Theater. I think it's definitely worth for your money.Some times you can go to see the Stage Drama.Specially on weekday If you have a Tampines Hub Passion card the ticket price is very affordable. Seat is reasonably comfortable.The movie image and sound system quality is good.The Thearter management allow you to bring your own food and snacks into the theatre..ğŸ­ğŸ””ğŸ“½ï¸ğŸ¥ğŸ“¹ğŸï¸ğŸ¬ğŸ«ğŸŸï¸ğŸ“¸

Love this cinema, the tickets are very affordable if you have a tampines hub passion card. Even comes with a small packet of salted caramel popcorn, all for the price of $6. Saw people bringing in food like KFC and encik tan as well. Went on a Thursday night and it was not crowded. Definitely would go again
Attended a Jazz performance. Acoustics are great. Good view of stage. Small though.

Screens current movies. Value for money definitely especially when discounted with Passion Card. Better to choose middle row seats as the theatre also functions as an Arts theatre. Easier to walk through the library. Great experience.
